description: This file is a JavaScript source file implementing a TodoMVC application using jQuery, Handlebars, and Router. It defines utility functions, an App object with methods for managing todos, and initializes the app.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the TodoMVC app, sets up templates, event bindings, and routing.

methods.name: bindEvents
methods.description: Binds DOM events to app methods for user interactions.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the todo list and UI components based on current state.

methods.name: renderFooter
methods.description: Renders the footer with todo counts and filters.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggles completion status of all todos.

methods.name: getActiveTodos
methods.description: Returns list of active (not completed) todos.

methods.name: getFilteredTodos
methods.description: Returns todos filtered by current filter ('all', 'active', 'completed').

methods.name: indexFromEl
methods.description: Finds index of todo based on DOM element.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles completion status of a specific todo.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a todo.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a todo's title after editing.
